name: Ext_R5_MedicationAdministration_medication
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationAdministration.medication for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.medication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Identifies the medication that was administered. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.medication` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.medication[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifies the medication that was administered. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the medication or a simple attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.medication` maps to R4B `MedicationAdministration.medication[x]`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codes identifying substance or product that can be administered.
